scripts.start:tauri: AGENTS=2 BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network:tauri
scripts.start:electron: AGENTS=2 BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) npm run network:electron
scripts.start:android: npm run package && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm run -w ui start" "npm run launch:android"
scripts.network:tauri: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm run -w ui start" "npm run launch:tauri"
scripts.network:electron: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm run -w ui start" "npm run launch:electron"
scripts.network:android: npm run build:happ && BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) INTERNAL_IP=$(internal-ip --ipv4) concurrently -k "npm run local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 npm run -w ui start" "AGENTS=1 npm run launch:tauri" "npm run launch:android"
scripts.launch:browser: echo "starting with admin $VITE_ADMIN_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/kando.happ --run=$VITE_APP_PORT -a kando network -b "http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT"  webrtc "ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.x: hc s clean &&  npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:browser" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s $SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.tool-devy: concurrently "npm start -w ui" "sleep 1 && we-dev-cli --agent-idx 1 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts" "sleep 10 && we-dev-cli --agent-idx 2 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts"
scripts.tool-devx: BPORT=46263 SPORT=46262; concurrently "hc run-local-services -b $BPORT -s $SPORT" "npm start -w ui" "./we_dev/we.AppImage  --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 1 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT" "sleep 10 && ./we_dev/we.AppImage --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 2 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:zomes: RUSTFLAGS='' CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --workspace --exclude kandoapp
scripts.build:android: npm run package && npm run tauri android build --apk
